question:
You recently took a long vacation. In your absence a friend did you a huge favor.
Write a letter thanking to your friend. ın your letter:
Explain what the favor was
Desribe how this favor helped you
Offer compansation
Write at least 150 word
text: I hope you are well. Everything is fine with me in terms of your favour. I am writing this letter to thank you sincerely.

As you know last month while I was taking a vacation the unplanned sales summit took place. It was my task to prepare whole sales presentations and deliver them to the manager,however I was in the USA and had no chance to work remotely. Mehmet give me a call and told me that you made everything up for me.This help might be really saved my current job. As Mehmet said it was an excellent issue and my manager was satisfied. Now I owe you a lot because you spent a lot of time and maybe overworked.
As I remember next week will be held the marketing meeting. I would be glad if I will do all work on behalf of you. It could be a good opportunity to convey my pleasure. Please keep me posted.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase however. Consider adding a comma.
